definition: the main river through Shanghai/name of a district in Shanghai

sentences.english: The ice-free Huangpu River is the main waterway in the Shanghai area.
sentences.chinese: 常年不結冰的黃浦江是上海主要的水路通道。

sentences.english: Huangpu River permanent fountain depicts a group of moving stories of this period.
sentences.chinese: 黃浦江邊一組永久性噴泉再現了這段動人的佳話。

sentences.english: The Whangpoo was a glistening ribbon of drab yellow; it flowed with a quiet contentment .
sentences.chinese: 黃浦像一條發光的灰黃色帶子，很和平，很快樂。

sentences.english: Ferry lines across the Huangpu River will be completed within three months.
sentences.chinese: 三個月後還將開闢橫渡黃浦江的渡輪線。

sentences.english: Before modern history , Yangshupu was in the wild Huangpu river alone.
sentences.chinese: 近代以前，楊樹浦是僻處黃浦江畔的荒郊地帶。

sentences.english: The Huangpu River finds its way to the East Sea at around Chongming Island.
sentences.chinese: 黃浦江在崇明島附近匯入東海。

sentences.english: The Huangpu River winds its way across the city proper of Shanghai and pours into the East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 黃浦江曲曲彎彎流經上海市區，最後注入東海。

sentences.english: Shanghai stands on the Huangpu River.
We are going to meet at the bookstore in Huangpu District.
sentences.chinese: 我們將在黃浦區的那家書店碰面。

sentences.english: Those villas normally distribute in Jinan, Xuhui, Huangpu and Luwan district.
sentences.chinese: 通常它們分佈在靜安，徐匯，黃浦和盧灣幾個區域。

sentences.english: The most attractive work of architecture is no other than the Oriental Pearl Tower standing by the bank of the Huangpu River.
sentences.chinese: 最引人入勝的建築物當屬位於黃浦江畔的東方明珠塔。

sentences.english: People's Square is in the east of Huangpu District.
sentences.chinese: 人民廣場在黃浦區的東部。

sentences.english: Nu Xiao pearl gold trade, the pondering Huangpu Bund waterfront.
sentences.chinese: 怒嘯明珠金貿下，沉吟黃浦外灘濱。

sentences.english: Standing here, you find all the Bund, the Huangpu River and the city in sight4.
sentences.chinese: 站在這裏，外灘啊，黃浦江啊，個城市都盡收眼底。

sentences.english: The distinctive commodity of Huangpu industry is tourism craft.
sentences.chinese: 黃浦區的特色產品是旅遊紀念品。

sentences.english: This domain name had been redirected to Shanghai, PRC.
sentences.chinese: 這個域名被指向了上海黃浦區某地。

definition: Lakeside district/Hubin district of Sanmenxia city 三門峽市|三门峡市[San1 men2 xia2 shi4], Henan
Wusong river and dock area in Shanghai
Harbin, subprovincial city and capital of Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China
Changjiang 長江|长江 or Yangtze River/old name for Changjiang, especially lower reaches around Yangzhou 揚州|扬州
Shangcheng district of Hangzhou city 杭州市[Hang2 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang
Nankai district of Tianjin municipality 天津市[Tian1 jin1 shi4]
Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
